thread.title: Tai Chi Meetup - Cheng Man-Ching Form (Yang Style Short Form - 37 Movements)
thread.title_full: Tai Chi Meetup - Cheng Man-Ching Form (Yang Style Short Form - 37 Movements)

title: Tai Chi Meetup - Cheng Man-Ching Form (Yang Style Short Form - 37 Movements)
text: Gallery Detailed Description A Tai Chi Meetup (Tai Chi Chuan - Yang Style) will begin October 2015 in the River Falls pool parking lot at 7:00 am. The Meetup is sponsored by Crossbar Church. The Cheng Man-Ching Form (also known as the Yang Style Short Form - 37) will be taught and practiced. All levels are welcomed. Sifu Dan from the U.S. TAI CHI ACADEMY will lead the practice. No prior experience needed. REGISTRATION IS REQUIRED, please email Sifu Dan at daniel@ustaichi.com. Location River Falls Community (Pool Parking Lot) Woodbridge , VA 22192
